meanings.definition: Laminarias: a genus of brown algae
meanings.sent1: The laminarias swayed gently in the ocean currents.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study laminarias to learn more about marine ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The laminarias had a party and invited all the sea creatures.
meanings.sent4: The laminarias stood tall like underwater trees in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The laminarias provided shelter for small fish and crabs.

meanings.definition: Laminarias: pertaining to or resembling seaweed of the genus Laminaria
meanings.sent1: The laminarias plants added a beautiful touch to the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: The diver admired the laminarias swaying gracefully in the water.
meanings.sent3: The laminarias fashion show featured seaweed-inspired outfits.
meanings.sent4: Her hair flowed behind her like laminarias in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The room was decorated with laminarias-themed decorations for the party.
